name: THE LEVEL (hard game)
description:
THE LEVEL ( HARD GAME )

This game was made in one day and its name says it is hard. Is it true? Absolutely not. This game is easy. I had finished it three times.

If you play this in the browser, use the fullscreen button. Just do it.

If you download this then thank you for your downloading!

If you love this game look my other games on itch.io.

If you are making games or comics join "ByDEN. Game And Comic Jam" that starts soon!!!

Comment your experience and feel free to contact me via email ( dennisbydengames@gmail.com)!

Follow my work and see you in my next projects and games!!!
